src:
Curtis Holt: "My First Year as a Blender YouTuber"
01 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Curtis Holt
Curtis Holt writes:
Hi everyone!Recently I passed the milestone of being a Blender-focused YouTuber for one year!A lot has happened in the past 12 months, not only for me, but also for the Blender community as a whole.I've prepared a video talking about some of my personal highlights:



Thanks for watching, and thank you for an amazing year!
